md:
giải nghĩa từ "interval" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Interval (noun)

* Meaning: A period of time between two events or actions.
* Vietnamese: Khoảng thời gian

Example sentence: The interval between the two meetings was two hours.

* Related words: gap, pause, break, span
* Antonyms: continuity, sequence

Interval (music)

* Meaning: A distance between two musical notes.
* Vietnamese: Khoảng cách âm nhạc

Example sentence: The interval between the two notes was a perfect fifth.

* Related words: pitch, tone, harmony, melody
* Antonyms: unison, monotone

Interval (mathematics)

* Meaning: A set of numbers that includes all numbers between a starting point and an ending point.
* Vietnamese: Khoảng số

Example sentence: The interval from 1 to 10 includes all numbers between 1 and 10.

* Related words: range, span, set, sequence
* Antonyms: point, singleton

Note: The meaning of "interval" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions are some of the most common meanings of the word.
